Queries.AddInformation: INSERT INTO CrudApplication(UserName, EmailID, MobileNumber, Salary, Gender) VALUES (@UserName, @EmailID, @MobileNumber, @Salary, @Gender);
Queries.UpdateInformationByID: UPDATE CrudApplication SET UserName=@UserName, EmailID=@EmailID, MobileNumber=@MobileNumber, Salary=@Salary, Gender=@Gender WHERE UserId=@UserId
Queries.DeleteInformationByID: UPDATE CrudApplication SET IsActive=0 WHERE UserId=@UserId
